label: 濫訴
対訳語: A false suit, or arbitrary accusation.""
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Central proprietors commonly brought unjustified complaints to the Kamakura Bakufu. When claims were identified as false, the warrior regime would dismiss them as ranso. But since Kamakura could impose no sanctions on offenders, false suits continued.
